name: Beff Jezos: Time Shift Manager
description:
Welcome to the Nozama warehouse. Billionaires have “improved” the efficiency of employee shifts by forcing them to use time travel. Use arrow keys to move. Space to restart level. Push boxes into the box doors. Go through a time portal to go back in time. Once you get both packages in the package holes, exit through the golden portal. But beware, you are working with an unstable timeline. Get back to the portal before time runs out!

Block pushing automation puzzle with time travel
